","Tone":"Practical, upbeat, authoritative, and insider-savvy. Use phrasing like warm-up ring, jog strip, vendor row, barn row, and schooling gate.","Official venue link":"https://www.pgparks.com","Reference schema":"https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/section_profile_example.json","Minimum required JSON fields":"section_uid, section_type, section_title, section_overview, section_keywords, section_cta_text, section_img, section_img_alt, section_link, section_meta_description, section_open_graph_title, section_open_graph_description, section_search_title, section_search_description, section_spotlight"}]
data-section:
{
  "section_uid": "capc-venue.section-profile",
  "section_type": "section_profile",
  "section_title": "Prince George Equestrian Center — Showday Profile",
  "section_overview": "Set in Upper Marlboro, MD (Eastern Time), Prince George Equestrian Center is a practical A-circuit stop where time management matters. Barn row is compact, vendor row is easy to access, and the warm-up rings flow efficiently to the schooling gate. Expect straightforward parking and an easy jog strip setup—plan your day around ring calls, not traffic.",
  "section_keywords": [
    "Prince George Equestrian Center",
    "Upper Marlboro",
    "hunter/jumper",
    "A-circuit",
    "warm-up ring",
    "schooling gate",
    "jog strip",
    "vendor row",
    "stabling",
    "barn row",
    "ET timezone",
    "truck and trailer parking"
  ],
  "section_cta_text": "Plan your PGEC show week",
  "section_img": "https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/assets/placeholders/capc-venue_hero.jpg",
  "section_img_alt": "Hunter/jumper rings and barn row at Prince George Equestrian Center in Upper Marlboro, MD",
  "section_link": "https://www.pgparks.com",
  "section_meta_description": "A practical, insider look at Prince George Equestrian Center (Upper Marlboro, MD) for A-circuit hunter/jumper riders—warm-up flow, jog strip, vendor row, and time-saving tips.",
  "section_open_graph_title": "Prince George Equestrian Center — Insider Profile for A-Circuit Riders",
  "section_open_graph_description": "Plan your week at PGEC with ring-flow cues, jog strip notes, vendor row access, and parking tips—built for riders, trainers, and barn crews.",
  "section_search_title": "Prince George Equestrian Center (Upper Marlboro, MD) — A-Circuit Show Profile",
  "section_search_description": "Insider, time-saving profile for PGEC: warm-up to schooling gate flow, jog strip setup, vendor row access, and practical parking notes.",
  "section_spotlight": [
    {
      "label": "Ring flow",
      "detail": "Warm-up rings feed cleanly to the schooling gate—stage your rider early to avoid pile-ups before first trips."
    },
    {
      "label": "Jog logistics",
      "detail": "Keep a dedicated handler and number runner; jog strip typically moves quickly between divisions."
    },
    {
      "label": "Parking & access",
      "detail": "Large surface lots; stage trailers early and confirm overnight rules with show office if you’re leaving rigs on site."
    },
    {
      "label": "Vendor row",
      "detail": "Compact layout near the main traffic lanes—easy for quick boot repairs, studs, and last-minute tack."
    },
    {
      "label": "Timing (ET)",
      "detail": "All schedules run on Eastern Time—set alarms for course walks and ring calls to buffer regional traffic on MD-4/MD-301."
    }
  ]
}

prompt-link:
TASK: Curate venue links for [{"venue_official_name":"Prince George Equestrian Center","state_uid":["recfffglVZKxKv6gS"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.pgparks.com","city_uid":["recAVvfPYaKgGBw6u"],"placeId":"EjoxNDkwMCBQZW5uc3lsdmFuaWEgQXZlLiAjMmMsIFVwcGVyIE1hcmxib3JvLCBNRCAyMDc3MiwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgmP5vlqp5a3iRF0eWCj8rFCeBICMmM","formatted_addressv3":"14900 Pennsylvania Ave, Upper Marlboro, MD 20772","venue_recordId":"recHvOcqYAhOjpk5W"}] (venue_uid=[{"venue_official_name":"Prince George Equestrian Center","state_uid":["recfffglVZKxKv6gS"],"venue_official_link":"https://www.pgparks.com","city_uid":["recAVvfPYaKgGBw6u"],"placeId":"EjoxNDkwMCBQZW5uc3lsdmFuaWEgQXZlLiAjMmMsIFVwcGVyIE1hcmxib3JvLCBNRCAyMDc3MiwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgmP5vlqp5a3iRF0eWCj8rFCeBICMmM","formatted_addressv3":"14900 Pennsylvania Ave, Upper Marlboro, MD 20772","venue_recordId":"recHvOcqYAhOjpk5W"}]), Prince George Equestrian Center represents an Equestrian Venue located near , Location: 14900 Pennsylvania Ave, Upper Marlboro, MD 20772, GEO context: lat=38.8108793, lon=-76.7493977 placeid=EjoxNDkwMCBQZW5uc3lsdmFuaWEgQXZlLiAjMmMsIFVwcGVyIE1hcmxib3JvLCBNRCAyMDc3MiwgVVNBIh4aHAoWChQKEgmP5vlqp5a3iRF0eWCj8rFCeBICMmM., ### Venue Link Field Definitions - venue_official_link → Canonical homepage for the venue. - venue_link_stay → On-site or affiliated lodging (hotels, resorts, rentals). - venue_link_dine → Venue-hosted or recommended dining/restaurants. - venue_link_locale → “Things to do” / local attractions content. - venue_link_events → Events schedule page (official calendar of shows). - venue_link_rvparks → Dedicated RV or campground info. - venue_link_vendors → Vendor Row / exhibitor marketplace. - venue_link_essentials → Practical services: groceries, pharmacy, tack. - venue_link_riders → Rider services: entries, scratches, registration info. - venue_link_barn → Barn & stabling: stalls, hay, bedding, feed services. - venue_link_services → On-site professional services: braiding, vet, farrier. - venue_link_results → Competition results, standings, order of go. - venue_link_carts → Golf cart rentals or mobility vehicles. - venue_link_cars → Car rental or transportation services., Goal: For each populated link, extract canonical content and return JSON.
Reference schema: https://crt-b1434e13de34.herokuapp.com/items/agents/hub-knowledge/examples/venue-link-curator_example_v2.json, Minimum required JSON fields per link:
venue_uid, category, field, url, canonical_title, meta_description, keywords, notes
